meanings.definition: The act or state of oscillating.
meanings.sent1: The oscillations of the pendulum were mesmerizing to watch.
meanings.sent2: The gentle oscillations of the boat on the water were soothing.
meanings.sent3: The oscillations of the swing made the child giggle with joy.
meanings.sent4: The oscillations of emotions in her heart mirrored the stormy sea.
meanings.sent5: The rhythmic oscillations of the metronome kept the musicians in perfect time.

meanings.definition: A single swing or movement to and fro.
meanings.sent1: The oscillations of the grandfather clock marked each passing hour.
meanings.sent2: The pendulum's oscillations were precise and consistent.
meanings.sent3: The oscillations of the playground swing brought back memories of carefree days.
meanings.sent4: The oscillations of the fan cooled the room with a gentle breeze.
meanings.sent5: The oscillations of the metronome guided the pianist's playing.
